name: Marked for Death
description: Kali selects a god to Mark. Kali gains Physical Penetration against that god, and Heals 80% of her Max Health for killing the god or 20% for assisting. Gold Bounty from that god is increased by 30% for a Kill or Assist. If the current target dies the enemy god closest to Kali becomes marked. If Kali is killed by an enemy god she may choose a new target.
